Reviews.Title: Canon 100 f2/8L Macro
Reviews.Author: Schatzie
Reviews.Content: This lens has the most clarity than all my lenses due to that it's fixed and an L... Love it, if you are thinking about purchasing it and have the cash DO IT... It takes outstanding Macro & Portrait shots. IS & f2/8 rocks!

Reviews.Title: Canon Macro 100mm f/2.8L
Reviews.Author: Jan Van Steenwijk "Movie watcher"
Reviews.Content: One of the best lenses I have, sharp to the last mm. I photograph a lot of old (1800') Ambrotypes and Daguerreotypes for research and this lens is just what I needed. Delivery was prompt as promised.Jan

Reviews.Title: Grerat lens
Reviews.Author: mkh
Reviews.Content: Believe me, I shopped for this lens as it was a pricey investment for an amateur photographer.  This was the best deal out there!  I love the lens - and I've taken some incredible photos using it.  Especially good for close up work, and where you want a very narrow focus area.  It was well worth the money, and all the extra pieces that came with it were a bonus!
